• Segment Routing

  • Scientific Papers

    IETF Proceedings

    Segment Routing is being standardized by the IETF.
    The architecture and use-cases are handled in the SPRING working group.
    Protocol extensions are handled in their specific protocol working group (ISIS, OSPF, IDR, PCEP, 6MAN).

    Use-Cases and Requirement

    • Source Packet Routing in Networking (SPRING) Problem Statement and Requirements RFC 7855
    • Use-cases for Resiliency in SPRING WG Document
    • IPv6 SPRING Use Cases WG Document
    • A Scalable and Topology-Aware MPLS Dataplane Monitoring System WG Document
    • BGP-Prefix Segment in large-scale data centers WG Document
    • Segment Routing Centralized BGP Peer Engineering WG Document
    • Label Switched Path (LSP) Ping/Trace for Segment Routing Networks Using MPLS Dataplane WG Document
    • Interconnecting Millions Of Endpoints With Segment Routing Draft

    Architecture

    • Segment Routing Architecture WG Document

    • Segment Routing Conflict Resolution WG Document

    • Anycast Segments in MPLS based Segment Routing Draft
    • Topology Independent Fast Reroute using Segment Routing Draft

    • Seamless Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (S-BFD) for Segment Routing Draft
